content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes the process described in the first paragraph of the excerpt?

choices.label: Native American agriculture encouraged the growth of socially diversified urban areas.
An arid climate led Native Americans to construct irrigation projects in the Mississippi River valley.
The climate in North America discouraged the development of large settlements.
Military power helped Native American hunters and gathers to conquer expansive cities.

topic.text: 1.2: Native American Societies Before European Contact

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
